title: Massive Prize Purse Uncorked: New Winery Sponsor Brings Mega Money to Levi’s GranFondo
content:
Thanks to a partnership with Skipstone Winery, there will be $156,000 up for grabs at this year's Growler, Levi Leipheimer's California road race.

Read the full article at Massive Prize Purse Uncorked: New Winery Sponsor Brings Mega Money to Levi’s GranFondo on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
